1.title: What have the prospects for Chinese national rejuvenation been predominantly guided by?
1.titleTranslate: 中国民族复兴的前景主要是由什么所指引的

answer.title: Leadership of the Party
answer.titleTranslate: 党的领导

errorOpinion: The Chinese youth movement
Economic development
International trade relations

2.title: Which of the following is NOT a requirement of President Xi for Chinese youths to realize the Chinese dream of national rejuvenation
2.titleTranslate: 以下哪一项不是习近平主席对中国青年实现中华民族伟大复兴中国梦的要求？

word.translate: n. 下列事物；以下内容

word.phrase: the Chinese dream of national rejuvenation
word.translate: 中华民族伟大复兴的中国梦

answer.title: Accept existing conditions in society
answer.titleTranslate: 接受社会中现有的状况

errorOpinion: Deserve the trust of the nation
Meet the demands of the CPC and the people
Firmly follow the CPC and cooperate with others

3.title: According to President Xi, what makes China’s youth such a powerful element among the forces of society
3.titleTranslate: 根据习近平主席的说法，是什么使中国青年成为社会力量中如此强大的一支？

word.translate: n. 要素；因素；组成部分
根据习近平主席的说法

answer.title: Its action and energy
answer.titleTranslate: 它的行动力和活力

errorOpinion: Its honesty and sincerity
Its dependability and responsibility
Its loyalty and dedication

4.title: According the President Xi, which of the following will enable China’s youth to build a powerful nation
4.titleTranslate: 根据习近平主席的说法，以下哪一项将使中国青年能够建设强大的国家？

word.translate: n. 下列事物；以下内容
根据习近平主席的说法

answer.title: Possessing great ideals and firm beliefs
answer.titleTranslate: 拥有远大理想和坚定信念

word.phrase: possess great ideals and firm beliefs
word.translate: 拥有远大理想和坚定信念

errorOpinion: Receiving a quality education
Being worldly and well-traveled
Pursuing fulfilling careers

5.title: What does the saying “A person who aspires to be a saint will become a saint; and a person who aspires to be a sage will become a sage” mean
5.titleTranslate: 谚语“立志成圣者可成圣，立志成贤者可成贤”是什么意思？

word.phrase: a person who aspires to be …

answer.title: People have different goals in life
answer.titleTranslate: 人们在人生中有不同的目标

errorOpinion: Sages are wiser than saints
Some goals are more worth pursuing than others
It is better to be a saint than a sage

1.title: What is the significance of one’s 18th birthday in modern China?
1.titleTranslate: 在当代中国，18岁生日有什么意义？

answer.title: It marks one’s entry into adulthood
answer.titleTranslate: 它标志着一个人步入成年

errorOpinion: It is a celebration of one’s youth
It marks the beginning of one’s college life
It marks one’s graduation from high school

2.title: What did the “passage to adulthood” ceremonies in ancient China signal a young person’s right to do
2.titleTranslate: 中国古代的“成人礼”仪式表明年轻人有权做什么？

word.translate: 步入成年；成人阶段的过渡

answer.title: Get married
answer.titleTranslate: 结婚

errorOpinion: Share family responsibilities
Dress as they wished
Be a member of the noble class

3.title: Which of the following conditions needed to be met for a girl’s family to hold jili
3.titleTranslate: 女孩的家庭需要满足以下哪项条件才能举行笄礼？

word.translate: n. 下列事物；以下内容
n. 笄礼（中国古代女子成人礼）

answer.title: The girl had to come from a noble family
answer.titleTranslate: 这个女孩必须出身于贵族家庭

errorOpinion: The girl had to be married
The girl had to be educated in proper speaking, dressing, and needlework
The master of the ceremony could not be related to the girl

4.title: During guanli, what was the final step which confirmed the boy’s passage into adulthood
4.titleTranslate: 在冠礼过程中，哪一个最终步骤确认了男孩步入成年？

word.translate: n. 冠礼（中国古代男子成人礼）

answer.title: The boy would give a salute to all the guests
answer.titleTranslate: 男孩会向所有来宾行礼

word.translate: v. 将会（表示过去将来或礼仪性动作）

errorOpinion: The boy would change into a dark-colored costume
The boy’s father would give a speech
The master of the ceremony would put a cap on the boy’s head

5.title: According to the passage, which of the following statements is true
5.titleTranslate: 根据文章内容，以下哪一项说法是正确的？

word.translate: n. 下列事物；以下内容

answer.title: What marked the beginning of adulthood in ancient China was different than what marks the beginning of adulthood in modern China
answer.titleTranslate: 中国古代标志成年开始的方式与现代中国标志成年开始的方式不同

errorOpinion: The definition of youth is the same across all nations
Today, large ceremonies are held in China to mark a young person’s entry into adulthood
The definition of adulthood is the same across all nations

1.title: According to the text, what feature makes Chinese path to modernization more complicated than that of other countries?
1.titleTranslate: 根据文章，是什么特征使中国的现代化道路比其他国家的更为复杂？

answer.title: Its large population
answer.titleTranslate: 其庞大的人口规模

errorOpinion: Its diverse topography
Its geographic location
Its geographic location

2.title: How does socialism with Chinese characteristics define common prosperity
2.titleTranslate: 中国特色社会主义如何界定共同富裕？

answer.title: Improvement of the quality of life for all the people
answer.titleTranslate: 全体人民生活质量的提升

word.phrase: improvement of the quality of life

errorOpinion: Total modernization of the Chinese economy
Promotion of justice and equality within Chinese society
Absence of polarization among citizens

3.title: What does cultural-ethical enrichment mean in the context of Chinese socialist modernization
3.titleTranslate: 在中国式社会主义现代化背景下，文化—伦理充实意味着什么？

word.translate: 中国式社会主义现代化

answer.title: Promoting Chinese culture and encouraging strong morals and values among the people
answer.titleTranslate: 弘扬中华文化，培育人民良好的道德和价值观

errorOpinion: Implementing policies that will ensure material abundance for all
Adopting strategies which will facilitate modernization
Prioritizing environmental protection and preservation of China’s natural resources

4.title: Which of the following best defines the concept of sustainable development
4.titleTranslate: 以下哪一项最能界定可持续发展的概念？

word.translate: n. 下列事物；以下内容

answer.title: Development that addresses not only the needs of the present but ensures resources for the future
answer.titleTranslate: 既满足当代需求，又确保为未来保留资源的发展

errorOpinion: Development that discourages land development within sensitive ecosystems
Development focused on the conservation of renewable natural resources
Development that promotes environmental protection through the use of recyclable materials only

5.title: Which would NOT be a characteristic of Chinese modernization
5.titleTranslate: 以下哪一项不是中国式现代化的特征？

answer.title: Expanding and enriching land through conflict and colonization
answer.titleTranslate: 通过冲突和殖民扩张并掠夺土地资源

errorOpinion: Developing land in a sustainable manner
Allowing nature to restore and regenerate itself
Adopting policies which foster benefits for all nations

1.title: What evidence is there in the story to prove that Yuan Xian is NOT very bothered by his poverty
1.titleTranslate: 故事中有哪些证据可以证明原宪并不太在意自己的贫穷？

answer.title: He sits properly in his house playing on a string instrument
answer.titleTranslate: 他端坐在家中弹奏弦乐器

errorOpinion: He carries a briar stick and wears a hemp cap
He wears a pair of shoes without heels
He lives in a little shack

2.title: Why does Yuan Xian feel that wealth is NOT necessarily a good thing
2.titleTranslate: 原宪为什么认为财富不一定是好事？

answer.title: Wealthy people often do things for people’s praise
answer.titleTranslate: 富有的人常常为了他人的称赞而做事

errorOpinion: Wealthy people have many friends
Wealthy people do things for humanity and justice
Wealthy people enjoy simple pleasures

3.title: What is the meaning of the expression, “The contented man does not land himself in involvements on account of money”
3.titleTranslate: “知足之人不会因为金钱而使自己陷入纷争”这句话是什么意思？

answer.title: One does not need much money to lead a fulfilling life.
answer.titleTranslate: 一个人不需要很多钱也能过上充实的生活。

word.translate: adj. 令人满足的；充实的

errorOpinion: One cannot be contented without money
Only wealthy people have friends
Living in poverty is better than being wealthy

4.title: Why did Emperor Yao NOT want the three things that everyone desired
4.titleTranslate: 尧帝为什么不想要人人都渴望的那三样东西？

answer.title: They were not helpful to the development of one’s character
answer.titleTranslate: 它们不利于一个人品格的发展

errorOpinion: He was a humble man
He was too occupied with many affairs
He did not like children

5.title: How does the officer view the afterlife of a sage
5.titleTranslate: 这位官员如何看待圣人的来世？

answer.title: He is protected from consequences of earthly matters
answer.titleTranslate: 他免受世俗事务后果的影响

errorOpinion: He goes about like a bird without a definite destination
He meets challenges without difficulty.
He is prosperous and leads a leisurely life

1.title: How has the development of new technologies affected the global economic structure?
1.titleTranslate: 新技术的发展如何影响了全球经济结构？

answer.title: By urging countries to develop their digital economies
answer.titleTranslate: 通过推动各国发展数字经济

errorOpinion: By slowing down the process of social development
By allowing poorer countries to compete in the global economy
By accelerating growth of the traditional economy

2.title: What initiative by the 18th CPC Central Committee has supported the growth of the digital economy in China?
2.titleTranslate: 中共十八届中央委员会提出的哪一项举措支持了中国数字经济的发展？

word.translate: 中共十八届中央委员会

answer.title: Implementing a national policy regarding the development of China’s cyber capabilities
answer.titleTranslate: 实施有关中国网络能力发展的国家政策

errorOpinion: Allowing companies to develop digital infrastructure at their own pace.
Integrating analog (模拟) and cyber technology
Separating new technologies from the traditional economy

3.title: According to the text, which of the following would be considered a “smart society”?
3.titleTranslate: 根据文章内容，以下哪一项会被视为“智慧社会”？

word.translate: n. 下列事物；以下内容

answer.title: One which has fully integrated AI, big data, and internet with its traditional economy
answer.titleTranslate: 一个将人工智能、大数据和互联网与传统经济充分融合的社会

errorOpinion: One which relies on the separation of digital industries to gain an international competitive edge.
One which relies on the development of traditional industries.
One which has a highly educated population.

4.title: What proves that the Chinese government’s policies on cyber development have been successful?
4.titleTranslate: 什么证明了中国政府在网络发展方面的政策是成功的？

answer.title: China has maintained a high ranking among global digital economies
answer.titleTranslate: 中国在全球数字经济中保持了较高的排名

errorOpinion: The spread of the COVID-19 epidemic has been prevented.
The growth of the Chinese digital economy has been gradual and consistent.
Local governments have worked to promote digital economies in their own cities

5.title: Negative consequences of rapid digital growth in China
5.titleTranslate: 中国数字化快速发展带来的负面影响

answer.title: The rise of unlawful activity among digital technology users
answer.titleTranslate: 使用数字技术者中违法行为的增加

word.phrase: among those who use digital technologies
word.translate: 在使用数字技术的人群中

errorOpinion: The abandonment of traditional industries
Inconsistent growth of the Chinese economy
The threat to Chinese national security

1.title: Digitalization supports global interest in traditional Chinese culture and arts
1.titleTranslate: 数字化推动全球对中国传统文化和艺术的兴趣增长

answer.title: Digitalization allows easy access to information about traditional Chinese arts and culture
answer.titleTranslate: 数字化使人们能够轻松获取关于中国传统艺术和文化的信息

errorOpinion: It has facilitated the dissemination of information about Chinese arts and culture among academics
It has fostered Chinese national spirit and pride in traditional artistic and cultural practices
It has allowed easier access to Chinese goods and services

2.title: Significance of the Digital Dunhuang project

answer.title: Digital Dunhuang project allows broader access to traditional Chinese arts and culture
answer.titleTranslate: 数字敦煌项目使人们能够更广泛地接触中国传统艺术和文化

errorOpinion: It provides comprehensive information about Chinese economic growth.
It can be accessed only by internet users in China.
It is limited to use by Chinese scholars only.

3.title: How digital technology fosters global harmony
3.titleTranslate: 数字技术如何促进全球和谐

answer.title: Digital technology offers opportunities for cross-cultural exchange
answer.titleTranslate: 数字技术提供了跨文化交流的机会

errorOpinion: It encourages strong nationalism
It provides a means of financial success for those who are economically disadvantaged.
It allows for rapid communication between world governments.

4.title: How UGC allows traditional Chinese culture to flourish globally
4.titleTranslate: UGC如何使中国传统文化在全球发展繁荣

word.translate: n. 用户生成内容（User-Generated Content的缩写）

word.phrase: allow traditional Chinese culture to flourish
word.translate: 使中国传统文化繁荣发展

answer.title: UGC allows worldwide access to Chinese culture and arts in real time
answer.titleTranslate: UGC使人们能够实时访问全球范围内的中国文化和艺术

word.translate: adj./adv. 全球范围的；全球地

errorOpinion: It provides a platform for Chinese artists to exchange ideas.
It provides a platform for Chinese artists to exchange ideas.
It encourages and facilitates the sale of Chinese art.

5.title: Importance of Chinese government constructing digital platforms for traditional culture and art？
5.titleTranslate: 中国政府建设传统文化和艺术数字平台的重要性？

word.translate: 传统文化和艺术的传播

answer.title: Digital platforms present Chinese nonphysical ideas globally
answer.titleTranslate: 数字平台向全球展示中国的非物质理念

word.phrase: present ideas to a global audience
nonphysical ideas such as values and beliefs
word.translate: 非物质理念，如价值观和信仰

errorOpinion: It presents an overview of China’s rapid industrial development.
It promotes an interest in collecting Chinese artifacts.
It teaches traditional Chinese artistic practices.

1.title: Significant achievements of China’s new period of reform and opening up
1.titleTranslate: 中国新时期改革开放的重要成就

word.phrase: period of reform and opening up
one of the most significant achievements

answer.title: Elimination of extreme poverty in China
answer.titleTranslate: 中国极端贫困的消除

errorOpinion: China’s standard of living has been consistently maintained.
China’s economy is the largest in the world.
China is closer to achieving the goal of moderate prosperity than ever before

2.title: How China’s development has benefited other nations
2.titleTranslate: 中国的发展如何惠及其他国家

answer.title: China’s development creates opportunities for common development in other countries
answer.titleTranslate: 中国的发展为其他国家带来共同发展的机会

errorOpinion: It has encouraged individual countries to resolve problems on their own
It has resulted in the improvement of infrastructure in developed countries
It has resulted in the building of healthcare facilities throughout the world

3.title: China's contribution to the global fight against COVID-19
3.titleTranslate: 中国为全球抗击新冠疫情所作的贡献

word.translate: adj./adv. 全球范围的；全世界的

answer.title: China shares pandemic response experience with other countries
answer.titleTranslate: 中国利用抗疫经验为其他国家提供参考

word.translate: v. 通知；提供信息；启发

errorOpinion: It has sent the largest number of medical supplies to other countries
It has provided financial support to foreign medical research students
It has developed the most widely used vaccines globally

4.title: China’s demonstrated leadership as a UN Security Council member
4.titleTranslate: 中国作为联合国安理会成员展现的领导力

word.phrase: as a member of the UN Security Council
word.translate: 作为联合国安理会成员

answer.title: China contributes to global peacekeeping operations
answer.titleTranslate: 中国为全球维和行动作出重要贡献

errorOpinion: It has been the only country to achieve the UN Millennium Development Goals.
It acts independently in international affairs.
It is the largest financial contributor to the UN.

5.title: Identifying the true statement according to the text
5.titleTranslate: 根据文章判断正确的陈述

answer.title: Applying the universality of human rights within cultural contexts
answer.titleTranslate: 各国必须在其独特的文化背景下贯彻人权的普遍性

word.phrase: apply the universality of human rights

word.translate: 在其独特的文化背景下

errorOpinion: Human rights are respected globally
Social trends have no relevance to human rights
Human rights are approached the same way in all countries

1.title: Importance of the Great Learning to Neo-Confucianists
1.titleTranslate: 为什么理学家认为《大学》是重要著作

answer.title: The Great Learning as the foundation for the learning of Dao
answer.titleTranslate: 《大学》作为道学学习的基础

word.phrase: foundation for the learning of Dao

errorOpinion: It was written by Zengzi
It outlined how to govern a state
It provided a guide on regulating one’s family

2.title: The goal of the Great Learning

answer.title: The Great Learning teaches how to achieve the highest good
answer.titleTranslate: 《大学》教人如何达至至善

errorOpinion: To teach one how to regulate the family.
To teach one how to be a head of state.
To teach sincerity in one’s thoughts.

3.title: Why the main statements of the Great Learning are described as cords
3.titleTranslate: 为什么将《大学》的主要论述比作绳索

word.phrase: main statements of the Great Learning

answer.title: Cords symbolize connection in the Great Learning
answer.titleTranslate: 绳索象征《大学》中各部分的联系

word.translate: 绳索将事物连接在一起

errorOpinion: Cords are long and narrow
Cords are a main element in music
Cords are impossible to break

4.title: Meaning of the statement on doing one’s best in the Great Learning
4.titleTranslate: 《大学》中“诚意尽善，乃至于至善”的含义

word.phrase: sincerely trying to do one’s best
word.translate: 真诚地尽自己最大努力

answer.title: Achieving the highest good without overstraining oneself
answer.titleTranslate: 不必超出自身能力即可达至至善

errorOpinion: One must always work to better oneself
Only the highly educated can achieve the highest good
To achieve the highest good requires one to be perfect

5.title: The central tenet of Confucianism

answer.title: Self-perfection precedes the perfection of others in Confucianism
answer.titleTranslate: 儒家思想中先修己再治人的理念

errorOpinion: It is imperative for an individual to fulfill his role in society, thereby cultivating himself
The highest form of perfection is to be a leader in society
Only heads of state or world leaders can bring about world peace.

1.title: Beijing 2022 Games contribute to China’s goal of a modern socialist country
1.titleTranslate: 北京2022年冬奥会和冬残奥会助力党建设现代化社会主义国家的目标

word.word: Beijing 2022 Winter Olympic and Paralympic Games
word.translate: 北京2022年冬奥会和冬残奥会
建设现代化社会主义国家

answer.title: Beijing 2022 Games left resources for China’s development
answer.titleTranslate: 北京2022年冬奥会和冬残奥会留下可用于中国发展的宝贵资源

errorOpinion: They required the building of necessary temporary infrastructure
They showcased the development of China’s cultural heritage
They integrated technology into all aspects of competition.

2.title: Government efforts to increase the popularity of winter sports in China
2.titleTranslate: 政府如何希望提高中国冬季运动的普及度

word.translate: n. 受欢迎程度；普及度

word.phrase: increase the popularity of winter sports
word.translate: 提高冬季运动的普及度

answer.title: Increasing popularity of winter sports through public involvement
answer.titleTranslate: 通过鼓励公众参与冬季运动来提高其普及度

word.phrase: increase popularity by encouraging public involvement
word.translate: 通过鼓励公众参与来提高普及度

errorOpinion: By building more winter sports venues and facilities
By reducing funding for summer sports and activities
By promoting sales of winter sports equipment

3.title: Cultural legacy of the 2022 Beijing Winter Games enhances China’s global profile
3.titleTranslate: 2022年北京冬奥会和冬残奥会的文化遗产提升中国的国际形象

word.word: 2022 Beijing Winter Olympic and Paralympic Games

word.translate: n. 世界舞台；国际舞台

word.phrase: enhance China’s profile on the world stage
word.translate: 提升中国在国际舞台上的形象

answer.title: Beijing 2022 Games increase global familiarity with Chinese culture and history
answer.titleTranslate: 北京2022年冬奥会和冬残奥会提升全球对中国文化和历史的了解

errorOpinion: They will highlight China’s commitment to human rights
They will serve as a template for host cities of future Olympic Games
They will highlight the role of volunteers in promoting social progress

4.title: Government encouragement of volunteerism
4.titleTranslate: 政府为何感到有必要鼓励志愿服务

word.translate: n. 志愿服务精神；志愿活动

answer.title: Volunteerism promotes qualities that advance social progress
answer.titleTranslate: 志愿服务培养推动社会进步的个人品质

errorOpinion: It allows individuals to expand their circle of friends
It promotes peace and mutual understanding
It promotes the development of physical fitness

5.title: How sports contribute to a well-rounded individual
5.titleTranslate: 体育运动如何促进个人全面发展

word.translate: adj. 全面的；多方面发展的

answer.title: Sports enhance individuals’ physical fitness and quality of life
answer.titleTranslate: 体育运动提高个人的体质和生活质量

errorOpinion: They encourage individuals to become professional athletes
They encourage research in sports and technology.
They emphasize physical fitness among the elderly.

1.title: Differences in the practice of sport in ancient China and other ancient cultures
1.titleTranslate: 古代中国体育实践与其他古代文化的差异

word.phrase: practice of sport in ancient China

word.translate: 与其他古代文化有所不同

answer.title: Sports in ancient China fostered societal cohesion and personal merit
answer.titleTranslate: 古代中国的体育方式促进了社会凝聚力和个人品德

word.phrase: foster societal cohesion and personal merit
word.translate: 促进社会凝聚力和个人品德

errorOpinion: Participation was limited to members of nobility
It encouraged individual competition
It emphasized physical strength as in wrestling and boxing

2.title: Why archery was favored by ancient Chinese kings according to the Book of Rites
2.titleTranslate: 《礼记》中为什么古代中国国王偏好射箭

answer.title: Archery fostered proper behavior and virtue
answer.titleTranslate: 射箭促进了正确行为和美德的发展

word.phrase: foster the development of proper behavior and virtue
word.translate: 促进正确行为和美德的发展

errorOpinion: Because it was a sport that both men and women participated in.
Because it was a sport practiced only by the higher classes.
Because it involved complex rules that only the most highly educated people could understand.

3.title: What dictated the rules of ritual archery
3.titleTranslate: 是什么规定了礼射的规则

answer.title: An archer’s social rank dictated ritual archery rules
answer.titleTranslate: 礼射的规则由射手的社会等级决定

errorOpinion: An archer’s physical strength.
An archer’s precision.
An archer’s musical skills.

4.title: Meaning of 'The student of virtue has no contentions'

answer.title: A moral person has no hostility towards others
answer.titleTranslate: 有德之人不与他人敌对/有德之人不争

word.translate: adj. 有道德的；品德高尚的

errorOpinion: A moral person will never face opposition from others
A moral person is always able to triumph over opponents.
A moral person is superior to all others.

5.title: Underlying principle of all competition in ancient China
5.titleTranslate: 古代中国所有竞争的基本原则

answer.title: Pushing oneself beyond one’s own limitations in ancient Chinese competition
answer.titleTranslate: 在古代中国竞争中超越自身极限

word.phrase: push oneself beyond one’s own limitations

errorOpinion: Bringing honor and respect to one’s family
Following rules to develop a sense of self-discipline
Defeating one’s opponents.
